text: Coriander relish #1 Mix together the coriander, garlic and salt, lime zest and juice in a food processor.  Process the mixture on the "pulse" button.  Add olive oil gradually and regularly. Put it through the feed tube of the processor. Process together well. Taste to see if it requires further seasoning. Serve. Use as a garnish on a cooked meal or as a relish for snacks etc Coriander relish #2 Prepare the ingredients: Cut the tomatoes into quarters, seed each one, then dice. Chop the coriander (cilantro) roughly. Chop the onion finely. Add the chopped ingredients to a salad or serving bowl. Mix together gently. Squeeze the lemon or lime juice over the top.  Season to taste with salt and pepper.  Serve. Use with meats, burgers, for dipping, as an accompaniment, etc. Finished.
